name: Powercut
description:
In Powercut, you jump into the darkness to repair your client's utilities and appliances.

But creatures only visible in the light make these tasks dangerous and life Threatening...

So you brought your shotgun to the job.

But your clients do not need to know that.

As long you get the task done no one will complain

Still polishing and bug testing the game so please give feedback here if you do finish

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfykzr52EjZA9CmjsQo39058wGEHXU5d-ewNYmV...
